Text: I'm sorry for the slow connection.

You've got all the torrents bridging the gap for the SD rips of this show, kudos! But can you please adjust your category from Highres - TV shows to just TV shows? You're killing my RSS reader. :)

Also, you can have your previous uploads moved to the proper category by way of the suprbay forums, so that could be an option for folks who filter out unwanted categories when searching.
